participant_1.background:
I enjoy Halloween because I get to dress up as animals.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.
my shyness made me panick and i didn t show up.
i went to an elite ivy league school.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.

participant_2.background:
Music is not my thing.
I prefer bananas because they are sweet and easy to eat.
i do not like trying new things.
people say i talk when i am not supposed to.
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.

content.text: Hey, what did you do for Halloween?
I went to a party with my friends and we ate a lot of candy.
Nice, what did you dress up as?
I dressed up as a banana because it is my favorite fruit.
That's a good choice. I usually dress up as an animal.
Why do you like to dress up as animals?
I like to feel like I can be something other than myself for a day.
I see, I like to dress up as a banana because it is a fun and easy costume to make.
I have always wanted to dye my hair red, but I am too afraid of what people will think.
I think it would look great on you! You should go for it!
Thanks, I might do it next time I get a chance.
Awesome! I would love to see it.
Of course! I love seeing people's new hair colors.
Well, I will let you know if I do it.
Great! I can't wait to see it.
